products.name: MAGCOMSEN Men's Polo Shirts Short Sleeve
products.description: style: Classic polo shirts with 3-button placket and spread collar, a loop under the buttons suitable for hanging sunglasses or microphone, dual pen pockets on left sleeve for your convenience.

products.name: Under Armour Men's New Freedom Flag T-Shirt
products.description: Everyone makes graphic Ts..but Under Armour makes them better. The fabric we use is light, soft, and quick-drying. Super-soft, cotton-blend fabric provides all-day comfort. Ribbed collar. Loose: Fuller cut for complete comfort. 60% Cotton/40% Polyester..

products.name: Button Down Regular Fit Long Sleeve Plaid Flannel Casual Shirts
products.description: Produced By Soft Cotton Fabric Which Gives Most Comfortable Wear; Ideal match with casual pants;cargo pants;jeans etc.
